name: Powstanie - Broadleaf - Robusto
additionalNotes: Brothers Mike & Greg Szczepankewicz, owners of Cigar Hustler and a B&M located in Daltona, Florida, created Powstanie (meaning “Uprising” in Polish) with assistance from Esteban and Skip of RomaCraft.  Powstanie is the first non-RoMa Craft blend to be manufactured at the Nica Sueno factory.  A friendly competition among the siblings resulted in the brands first release to be Mike’s which is wrapped in Ecuadorian Habano; Greg’s broadleaf Maduro, second.  If anything can be told from the drive and passion (not to mention a pretty strong competitive streak) in these brothers, we can expect great things from the Powstanie brand.
